00022 #ifndef INCLUDED_TUIOCONTAINER_H
00023 #define INCLUDED_TUIOCONTAINER_H
00024 
00025 #include "TuioPoint.h"
00026 #include <list>
00027 #include <string>
00028 
00029 #define TUIO_IDLE 0
00030 #define TUIO_ADDED 1
00031 #define TUIO_ACCELERATING 2
00032 #define TUIO_DECELERATING 3
00033 #define TUIO_STOPPED 4
00034 #define TUIO_REMOVED 5
00035 #define TUIO_ROTATING 6
00036 
00037 namespace TUIO {
00038         
00045         class LIBDECL TuioContainer: public TuioPoint {
00046                 
00047         protected:
00051                 long session_id;
00055                 float x_speed;
00059                 float y_speed;
00063                 float motion_speed;
00067                 float motion_accel;
00071                 std::list<TuioPoint> path;
00075                 int state;
00079                 int source_id;  
00083                 std::string source_name;
00087                 std::string source_addr;
00088         
00089         public:
00090                 using TuioPoint::update;
00091                 
00101                 TuioContainer (TuioTime ttime, long si, float xp, float yp):TuioPoint(ttime, xp,yp)
00102                         ,state(TUIO_ADDED)
00103                         ,source_id(0)
00104                         ,source_name("undefined")
00105                         ,source_addr("localhost")
00106                 {
00107                         session_id = si;
00108                         x_speed = 0.0f;
00109                         y_speed = 0.0f;
00110                         motion_speed = 0.0f;
00111                         motion_accel = 0.0f;                    
00112                         TuioPoint p(currentTime,xpos,ypos);
00113                         path.push_back(p);
00114 
00115                 };
00116 
00125                 TuioContainer (long si, float xp, float yp):TuioPoint(xp,yp)
00126                         ,state(TUIO_ADDED)
00127                         ,source_id(0)
00128                         ,source_name("undefined")
00129                         ,source_addr("localhost")               
00130                 {
00131                         session_id = si;
00132                         x_speed = 0.0f;
00133                         y_speed = 0.0f;
00134                         motion_speed = 0.0f;
00135                         motion_accel = 0.0f;                    
00136                         TuioPoint p(currentTime,xpos,ypos);
00137                         path.push_back(p);
00138                 };
00139                 
00146                 TuioContainer (TuioContainer *tcon):TuioPoint(tcon)
00147                         ,state(TUIO_ADDED)
00148                         ,source_id(0)
00149                         ,source_name("undefined")
00150                         ,source_addr("localhost")               
00151                 {
00152                         session_id = tcon->getSessionID();
00153                         x_speed = 0.0f;
00154                         y_speed = 0.0f;
00155                         motion_speed = 0.0f;
00156                         motion_accel = 0.0f;
00157                         TuioPoint p(currentTime,xpos,ypos);
00158                         path.push_back(p);
00159                 };
00160                 
00164                 virtual ~TuioContainer(){};
00165 
00173                 virtual void setTuioSource(int src_id, const char *src_name, const char *src_addr) {
00174                         source_id = src_id;
00175                         source_name = std::string(src_name);
00176                         source_addr = std::string(src_addr);
00177                 };
00178 
00182                 virtual const char* getTuioSourceName() const{
00183                         return source_name.c_str();;
00184                 };
00185 
00189                 virtual const char* getTuioSourceAddress() const{
00190                         return source_addr.c_str();
00191                 };
00192                 
00196                 virtual int getTuioSourceID() const{
00197                         return source_id;
00198                 };
00199                 
00209                 virtual void update (TuioTime ttime, float xp, float yp) {
00210                         TuioPoint lastPoint = path.back();
00211                         TuioPoint::update(ttime,xp, yp);
00212                         
00213                         TuioTime diffTime = currentTime - lastPoint.getTuioTime();
00214                         float dt = diffTime.getTotalMilliseconds()/1000.0f;
00215                         float dx = xpos - lastPoint.getX();
00216                         float dy = ypos - lastPoint.getY();
00217                         float dist = sqrt(dx*dx+dy*dy);
00218                         float last_motion_speed = motion_speed;
00219                         
00220                         x_speed = dx/dt;
00221                         y_speed = dy/dt;
00222                         motion_speed = dist/dt;
00223                         motion_accel = (motion_speed - last_motion_speed)/dt;
00224                         
00225                         TuioPoint p(currentTime,xpos,ypos);
00226                         path.push_back(p);
00227                         
00228                         if (motion_accel>0) state = TUIO_ACCELERATING;
00229                         else if (motion_accel<0) state = TUIO_DECELERATING;
00230                         else state = TUIO_STOPPED;
00231                 };
00232 
00233                 
00238                 virtual void stop(TuioTime ttime) {
00239                         update(ttime,xpos,ypos);
00240                 };
00241 
00254                 virtual void update (TuioTime ttime, float xp, float yp, float xs, float ys, float ma) {
00255                         TuioPoint::update(ttime,xp, yp);
00256                         x_speed = xs;
00257                         y_speed = ys;
00258                         motion_speed = (float)sqrt(x_speed*x_speed+y_speed*y_speed);
00259                         motion_accel = ma;
00260                         
00261                         TuioPoint p(currentTime,xpos,ypos);
00262                         path.push_back(p);
00263                         
00264                         if (motion_accel>0) state = TUIO_ACCELERATING;
00265                         else if (motion_accel<0) state = TUIO_DECELERATING;
00266                         else state = TUIO_STOPPED;
00267                 };
00268                 
00279                 virtual void update (float xp, float yp, float xs, float ys, float ma) {
00280                         TuioPoint::update(xp,yp);
00281                         x_speed = xs;
00282                         y_speed = ys;
00283                         motion_speed = (float)sqrt(x_speed*x_speed+y_speed*y_speed);
00284                         motion_accel = ma;
00285                         
00286                         path.pop_back();
00287                         TuioPoint p(currentTime,xpos,ypos);
00288                         path.push_back(p);
00289                         
00290                         if (motion_accel>0) state = TUIO_ACCELERATING;
00291                         else if (motion_accel<0) state = TUIO_DECELERATING;
00292                         else state = TUIO_STOPPED;
00293                 };
00294                 
00302                 virtual void update (TuioContainer *tcon) {
00303                         TuioPoint::update(tcon);
00304                         x_speed = tcon->getXSpeed();
00305                         y_speed =  tcon->getYSpeed();
00306                         motion_speed =  tcon->getMotionSpeed();
00307                         motion_accel = tcon->getMotionAccel();
00308                         
00309                         TuioPoint p(tcon->getTuioTime(),xpos,ypos);
00310                         path.push_back(p);
00311                         
00312                         if (motion_accel>0) state = TUIO_ACCELERATING;
00313                         else if (motion_accel<0) state = TUIO_DECELERATING;
00314                         else state = TUIO_STOPPED;
00315                 };
00316                 
00323                 virtual void remove(TuioTime ttime) {
00324                         currentTime = ttime;
00325                         state = TUIO_REMOVED;
00326                 }
00327 
00332                 virtual long getSessionID() const{ 
00333                         return session_id;
00334                 };
00335                 
00340                 virtual float getXSpeed() const{ 
00341                         return x_speed;
00342                 };
00343 
00348                 virtual float getYSpeed() const{ 
00349                         return y_speed;
00350                 };
00351                 
00356                 virtual TuioPoint getPosition() const{
00357                         TuioPoint p(xpos,ypos);
00358                         return p;
00359                 };
00360                 
00365                 virtual std::list<TuioPoint> getPath() const{
00366                         return path;
00367                 };
00368                 
00373                 virtual float getMotionSpeed() const{
00374                         return motion_speed;
00375                 };
00376                 
00381                 virtual float getMotionAccel() const{
00382                         return motion_accel;
00383                 };
00384                 
00389                 virtual int getTuioState() const{ 
00390                         return state;
00391                 };      
00392                 
00397                 virtual bool isMoving() const{ 
00398                         if ((state==TUIO_ACCELERATING) || (state==TUIO_DECELERATING)) return true;
00399                         else return false;
00400                 };
00401         };
00402 };
